Description:
Skills:
- Strong knowledge of procurement practices, procedures, and policies
- Excellent understanding of the materials purchasing process, including sourcing, negotiating, and contracting
- Proficient in conducting market research and supplier evaluation to identify potential vendors and assess their capabilities
- to develop and maintain with suppliers, ensuring timely delivery of quality materials
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to manage inventory levels and minimize costs
- Exceptional negotiation skills to secure the best prices and terms from suppliers
- Good organizational and time management skills to prioritize and meet deadlines
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with internal stakeholders and cross-functional teams
- Proficiency in using procurement software and tools to streamline the purchasing process
- Attention to detail and accuracy in maintaining procurement records and documentation
- Knowledge of relevant legal and regulatory requirements related to procurement and supply chain management
- Flexibility and adaptability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team demonstrating a proactive and results-oriented approach.Job Details
